word_mean: 甲酚，煤酚：甲酚的同分异构体之混合物，CH3C6H4OH，从煤焦油中提得，含苯酚5％以下
为无色有毒液体，亦可呈黄色至棕黄色或粉红色
其消毒防腐作用比苯酚强，主要用于消毒器械、盘碟、餐具及其他无生命物体。又称 cresyli c a cid和tri cresol

sentence.Network_en: The determination ofm - cresol content by brominating volumetric method was investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 探讨了 间甲酚 含量的容量分析方法.

sentence.Network_en: This paper suggested am - cresol purple, which could determine quantitatively the content of total acid in vinegar.
sentence.Network_cn: 利用间甲酚紫作指示剂定量地测定食醋中总酸的含量.

sentence.Network_en: Horseradish peroxidase catalyzed the copolymerization of lignin with cresol in the reversed micellar system.
sentence.Network_cn: 用过氧化物酶在微乳液中催化木质素与酚的聚合反应.
